divs: Sighting Detailsmy daughters and I who are 33 and 20 years old now, were coming back from the laundry mat in Easthamton Massachusetts it must have been about 7 p.m. when we saw two bright lights raising from the pond we used to live across from the street and we just wonder what could it be, as we got closer I thought it might be a helicopter but then I thought aloud helicopters only have one light, and as we got closer I realize this is not a helicopter. I stop just a few feet before I turned into my dry way and my daughter and I stuck our heads out of the window and this thing was hoovering above us not making a sound but just a (I can't not explain the sound ) but just like a very low hoovering sound above us I could hardly hear it, and all of the suddenly I got this alarming frightening feeling and as I looked out of the window I saw this thing hoovering above my car not quite 30 feet above my car, so I yelled at my daughter to go and get her father, as she runned tours the house I was still looking at this thing hoovering over my car and I got so frightened that I got out of the car and stared running tours my house and then I realize my baby was still in the car so I runned back it must have taken a couple of minutes before I got back to the car I took my baby out of the car and looked up, and all of the sudden this thing it just turn around in mid air without making a sound and flew away it was gone in a matter of seconds if not less. a few years after that, when my youngest daughter learn how to speak and then write all she used to talk about and write about is how she was in a different planet and how she used to tell these people she wanted to go home and be with her family I keep some of the papers she wrote back then
Summary: the objet was hoovering above us for about 30 seconds
